claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.

combined_evidence.quote: Availability and characteristics of specific products and presentations might change or differ from what is described in this table and in the text of this report.
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote acknowledges that the characteristics of influenza vaccines, which include cell- and egg-based vaccines, can change during production. Such changes could include mutations, supporting the claim that these vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may affect their effectiveness.
